code: import create from"zustand";var homeStore=create(function(set){return{notifCount:0,requestCount:0,increment:function increment(){return set(function(state){return{notifCount:state.notifCount+1};});},reset:function reset(){return set(function(){return{notifCount:0};});},resetRequest:function resetRequest(){return set(function(){return{requestCount:0};});},setRequests:function setRequests(r){return set(function(){return{requestCount:r};});},isPending:false,toggleDisplay:function toggleDisplay(){return set(function(state){return{isPending:!state.isPending};});}};});export default homeStore;
